content: i absolutely love designing shawls recently as i love gifting them to the people i truly care about this shawl is named after my husband s aunt and she chose these beautiful autumn colored whirl too this beautiful pattern is only using a few different stitches double_crochet front and back post double_crochet stitches to create a beautifully textured look this pattern is available for **free on my blog** or you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **difficulty ** beginner **us terms** used throughout **written pattern only with no chart** *i also made a stitch count chart for each row to keep your work tracked easily you can find it in a different pdf file * i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it **happy crocheting ** *krisztina*
